post.body: 2.14 however when gym'ing regularly I normally end up about where I started off due to muscle growth compensating for fat loss :)
real thing, which is probably why I'm so bad as there's no cheatcodes available in real life =)
what you doing on a heli pad? (ok, I get "catching a helicopter"...)
thanks, reading up on it now. I typically take ibuprofen or asprin and sit/sleep in a cool dark room. Maybe I'll go see a Dr too
quick kanji test - やりました
Summoning the motivation to get my lardy ass back to the gym next week... Turned into such a porker and need to lose ~30lbs
Catching up on Fringe. Better than Heroes Season 3 imo. Loving Walter's craziness "I just got an erection"
2 year olds are great - noise, drool, into everything and more drool. Luckily, I have a large vodka tonic and ice =)
Picked up NYE pyrotechnics. Mostly single ignition cakes so that I don't spend an hour lighting them all like last year. Cool. Can't wait...
Whoo! I really do suck at bowling =)
Never really believed in 24hr viruses before. Must be due to my lack of net access the past couple of days - body can't take it I suppose =)
Chavs have risen from their slums and have began to populate the town. Time to head home methinks =)
Planning my assault on the shops tomorrow... Gah, shopping sux. If only I'd been more organised and done it online already :(
45 mins to put new chair together! Weighs a ton due all the massage things in it. But, I'm sat here vibrating with a smile on my face now :)
looking for beta (alpha?) testers - view http://tinyurl.com/4sspwa (skip to 06:15 for soundscape) and then register at http://ambiphere.com
Drank loads of water, had a neutral lunch (no spices or cheese) and will be in bed early. Hopefully no headache in the AM.
Damn headaches! :( I need examine my eating, sleeping and other habits. Gotta be something that I'm doing wrong (or not doing right). Gah.
Could my day have been any more pants?! Luckily, there's not too much shite Sun hardware left to actually break...
Where did Quadodo a-go-go?
Wow - is the weekend over already?! *sigh*
